Class BigPig

Namespace
Pig.Variations
Assembly
Pig.Variations.dll

Implements the "Big Pig" variation of the game, played with two dice. This version rewards doubles and provides a significant bonus for rolling two ones.

public class BigPig : IPigVariation

Implements the "Big Pig" variation of the game, played with two dice. This version rewards doubles and provides a significant bonus for rolling two ones.

Property Value

int

Methods

ProcessRoll(IEnumerable<int>)

Evaluates a two-dice roll according to Big Pig rules:

  • Double 1s: 25 points, turn continues.
  • Single 1: 0 points, turn ends.
  • Other Doubles: Sum of dice multiplied by 2, turn continues.
  • Standard Roll: Sum of dice, turn continues.
public RollResult ProcessRoll(IEnumerable<int> dice)

Parameters

dice IEnumerable<int>

The values of the two dice rolled.

Returns

RollResult

A RollResult reflecting the Big Pig scoring rules.
